committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that the 3.5 percent pay increase to become effective beginning on January 1, 1985, may not apply to Members of Congress.

summary.text: Provides that the Federal pay increase to become effective on January 1, 1985, may not apply to Members of Congress.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the 3.5 percent pay increase to become effective beginning on January 1, 1985, may not apply to Members of Congress.
